skills.desc:
Places a [Veil] buff on all allies except this Champion for 1 turn. 

Also places a [Shield] buff on all allies for 2 turns equal to 20% of this Champion's MAX HP.
skills.name: Diversion

skills.desc: Decreases the damage received from skills by all allies under [Veil] or [Perfect Veil] buffs by 5%.
